file_content.text: I can't thank you enough. The Republic could use more folks like you.
I can't believe you got them back safe. Thank you. There's nothing worse than telling a family their loved one's been killed.
You've saved me from that pain.
I'm just glad they're home.
I'm happy to help.
They wouldn't be, if not for your help.
Just doing my job.
I'm afraid I have to disagree. Few others could have stepped up to that challenge.
You've made an old officer very happy. Thank you again.
Next time, find someone else.
If that's what you'd prefer, I understand. Thanks anyway.
There's more of my boys still out there. You have to keep looking!
Have you found my boys yet? They still haven't checked in.
Jedi. Never expected to see one of your order out here. Is it true that the Force can guide you to people?
This cold's sure something, eh, Captain? Think you've got time to help an old infantryman?
Hey, spacer. You interested in putting that blaster of yours to good use?
I've got that ache in my gut says my boys are in trouble. At my age, you learn to trust your feelings.
What sort of trouble?
Fill me in.
My best recon squad hasn't reported in, and I want to know what's happened.
What do you mean, "your boys"?
Your boys?
Recon Company, First Squad. Toughest boys I ever trained. They were due to report back hours ago.
I sent them to check out some caves nearby. Should've been routine.
Out with it, already.
One of my recon squads disappeared while checking out some caves near here. They still haven't checked in.
Don't tell 'em I said it, but they're the best we've got. Anything that stops them is a danger to the whole base.
If that's true, there's no time to lose. What do you need me to do?
What are we waiting for?
If they're alive? Help them. If not... we need to stop whatever found them.
What takes out a whole squad before they can call for help?
Any idea what's out there?
That's why I'm worried. There shouldn't have been anything out there but caves and ice.
Soldiers die all the time.
Death only wins if I'm in the mood to let him win--and today, I'm not.
That squad's in trouble. If they're alive, I need someone tough enough to help them. If they're not... we need to stop whatever got them.
It will be a pleasure to help, Sergeant.
I'll do it.
I knew I could rely on a Jedi to help.
The Force should guide me to them easily.
I'll find them for you.
Just be ready for trouble once you find them.
Point me in the right direction. I'll bring them home.
Just tell me where to go.
It was too quiet here anyway. Where do I go?
Sure, I'll do it.
Ha! That's the spirit!
I live for danger.
That's the sort of fire I'm looking for!
They last reported in from these coordinates--I'd start looking there. Those boys are counting on you.
I can't waste my talents on a lost cause.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
Guess those stories about the Jedi really are just legends.
Sorry, but I'm not that reckless. Or stupid.
That's suicide. [Refuse quest]
You Special Forces grunts would be nothing without us recon boys. Remember that next time you're locked down in the soup.
Tough break, old man, but there's no profit for me.
Sorry, but no. [Refuse quest]
I should have known better than to ask someone whose loyalty's for sale.
We need a more defensive base than this, and soon.
